title: Dear riot, please make a league of legends co-op zombie mode.
body:
like please.

here is what you do, on the twisted treeline map you enable 6 people to team up, the zombies have reduced health by a lot, reduced resistances, reduced damage, they spawn in waves and come to lanes, each wave has 1 more zombie than the previous, the zombies are either casters (mini zombie brands, but without abilities other than ranged auto attacks, range increased) or melee (mini sion, no abilities, damage reduced, tankiness reduced) each 10 waves you get a boss zombie on each lane, an increased sized champ with all his abilities. the bosses and zombies get stronger every wave. see how long we survive, you can go back to base to buy but not heal. healing can only be done from health packs dropped by zombies. which also drop gold packs.
